card.name: Regular Fan
card.description: A fan that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Wide Fan
card.description: A fan that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.name: Long Fan
card.description: A fan that hits 3 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Tonfa
card.description: A wooden weapon that can attack and stun the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Tanto
card.description: A short sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Wakizashi
card.description: A medium sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Katana
card.description: A standard sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Curved Blade
card.description: A sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tile below.

card.name: Wide Sword
card.description: A sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.name: Kanobo
card.description: A studded mace that hits hard and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Naginata
card.description: A spear that hits 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Bo Staff
card.description: A staff that stuns 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Tremor
card.description: The earth swells two tiles in front of you and destroys the third tile.

card.name: Single Bamboo Dart
card.description: Shoots a stun dart down the current row.

card.name: Double Bamboo Dart
card.description: Shoots a stun dart down the current row and row below.

card.name: Triple Bamboo Dart
card.description: Shoots a stun dart down all the rows.

card.name: Single Kunai
card.description: Throws a kunai in front of you.

card.name: Double Kunai
card.description: Throws a kunai in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Kunai
card.description: Throws a kunai in all three rows.

card.name: Single Shuriken
card.description: Throws a shuriken in front of you.

card.name: Double Shuriken
card.description: Throws a shuriken in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Shuriken
card.description: Throws a shuriken in all the rows.

card.name: Single Sai
card.description: Throws a sai dagger in front of you.

card.name: Double Sai
card.description: Throws a sai dagger in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Sai
card.description: Throws a sai dagger in all the rows.

card.name: Naginata Throw
card.description: A spear thrown at the tiles in front of you, piercing the first enemy and stopping at the second.

card.name: Single Fireball
card.description: A fireball that scorches an enemy in front of you.

card.name: Double Fireball
card.description: A fireball that scorches through 2 enemies.

card.name: Triple Fireball
card.description: A fireball that scorches through 3 enemies.

card.name: Single Lightning Bolt
card.description: A random lightning strike on the enemy field.

card.name: Double Lightning Bolt
card.description: 2 random lightning strikes on the enemy field.

card.name: Triple Lightning Bolt
card.description: 3 random lightning strikes on the enemy field.

card.name: Regular Heal
card.description: A basic Health restore.

card.name: Greater Heal
card.description: A medium Health restore.

card.name: Ultra Heal
card.description: A large Health restore.

card.name: Regular Shield
card.description: A magic shield that protects from 1 hit.

card.name: Super Shield
card.description: A magic shield that protects from 2 hits.

card.name: Ultra Shield
card.description: A magic shield that protects from 3 hits.

card.name: Smoke
card.description: Obscures your movement.

card.name: Oil Spill
card.description: Throw a little oil in front of you.

card.name: Oil Splash
card.description: Throws a cone of oil in front of you.

card.name: Oil Line
card.description: Throws a line of oil three tiles forward.

card.name: Big Oil
card.description: Cover half the enemy's field with oil.

card.name: Laser
card.description: A laser that strikes across the field.
